channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Photos: See the dazzling pictures of June's Strawberry Moon
item.description: A strawberry moon occurs during the time of year when strawberries fully ripen.

item.title: Anti-Immigrant Rioting Stretches Into Second Night in Northern Ireland
item.description: Homes, businesses and cars were attacked and 17 police officers were injured during violence in Ballymena and several other areas.

item.title: Inflation is holding steady as Trump's tariffs have yet to fully hit
item.description: Consumer prices in May were up 2.4% from a year ago, but inflation eased on a monthly basis, according to the latest figures from the Labor Department

item.title: Trump is Pushing Allies Away and Closer Into Each Other’s Arms
item.description: Important U.S. allies are trying to bolster their ties as the Trump administration shifts priorities and reshapes the world order.

item.title: Disney and Universal Sue A.I. Firm Midjourney for Copyright Infringement
